Package it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105053.controller

Class LedgerMenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105053.controller.LedgerMenuController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    public class LedgerMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller
    This class implements the interface Controller and has the responsibility to act as a bridge between the view and the model of the application.
    Author:
    Tommaso Catervi
